title: BPI - Social security number Update ( BPI-SSN )
content:
Dear BPI Community,

We are thrilled to announce that all activated BPI members now have a BPI Social Security Number (BPI-SSN). This is a significant milestone for our community.

The BPI-SSN is integrated with blockchain technology, and we will continue to enhance its features and benefits. In the future, members can look forward to additional functionalities, including NFC, QR codes, biometrics, secure address validation, NFT confirmation, discounts, and more.

Activate your account today to secure your BPI Social Security Number for yourself and your loved ones. Together, we will reposition Africa with our collective mission and unified purpose.

To locate your BPI-SSN, please visit your profile if you are an activated member.

Best Regards,

MGT

title: BPI Seals Strategic Partnership with Global Mobility Network
content:
BPI Seals Strategic Partnership with Global Mobility Network

June 9, 2024

We are thrilled to announce that BPI has sealed a strategic partnership with the Global Mobility Network, marking a significant milestone in our commitment to providing national and international leadership training. This partnership aligns perfectly with the objectives of our BPI Platinum Membership, which is dedicated to fostering international leadership development.

Celebrating Success and Looking to the Future

This partnership is a testament to our dedication to enhancing the leadership skills of our members. The Global Mobility Network, with its impressive track record and global presence, is the perfect partner to deliver top-tier international leadership training around the world.

Opportunities for CEOs, Senior Management, and Government Officials

We extend a warm welcome to CEOs, senior management personnel, and government officers to take full advantage of our BPI Platinum Membership. Members will enjoy express recommendations, global awards nominations, and cashback options to offset the financial requirements of international leadership training.

Join Us in This Exciting Journey

As we celebrate this success and look forward to the future with excitement, we invite you to join us in this transformative journey. The BPI Platinum Membership is your gateway to unparalleled leadership development opportunities and international networking.

Stay tuned for more updates and details on upcoming training sessions and events. Together with the Global Mobility Network, we are poised to elevate leadership standards globally.

Best regards,
Amb. Dr. DonGilead Okolonkwo
CEO, BPI

title: BPI PICK UP CENTER UPDATE .
content:
Dear BPI Community,

As we approach the milestone of 1,000 foundational members, we are excited to announce an important update for our active state representatives. To enhance our services, we will soon commence the approval process for pick-up locations across various states.

Key Points:
- Pick-Up Location Approval:
The approval process will start once a state reaches a minimum of 100 activated members.
A fee of N 100,000 is required for the establishment of a BPI pick-up center.

Special Offer for Initial States:
The first five states to gain approval will have their pick-up center fees covered by BPI.
Approved pick-up centers will grant their sponsors a cash palliative bonus. while the center owner will share revenue for every item picked up at the center.

State Representatives' Role:
As a state representative, you play a crucial role in the approval process of pick-up centers within your state.

Application Process:
To apply, please follow these steps:

1. Click on \"Palliative Services.\"
2. Select \"Pick-Up Location.\"
3. Click on \"Apply as a Pick-Up Center.\"

We look forward to expanding our network and providing even greater support to our community.

Best Regards,
BPI MGT

title: BPI Card Option Automated membership activation and confirmation.
content:
Dear BPI Community,

We are pleased to introduce an automated and instant membership activation and confirmation process to accommodate our growing community. By taking advantage of the card option, you can choose from four convenient and automatic payment methods: bank card, USSD, bank transfer, and OPay. The process is straightforward:

1. Bank Card: Select the card option, enter your card details, and submit. Once the payment is successful, your membership is activated automatically.
2. USSD: Select the USSD option, choose your bank, and dial the provided code. Follow the prompts to complete the payment.
3. Bank Transfer: Choose the bank transfer option, select your bank, and enter your mobile banking username and password to finalize the process.
4. OPay: Select the OPay option, enter your details as requested, and complete the payment.
Once your payment is successful, your account is activated instantly, and your palliative bonus is distributed. Spendable cash is also ready for immediate withdrawal.

Regards,

BPI Management
